TopicTitle: HOW do i turn off the numbers-

Articles.Content: I somehow activated something, where the letters J K L U I O P use the numbers displayed below them on the keyboard. Help? I hate this keyboard...

Should be labelled Fn.

Obviously I don\'t know where exactly it is, though.

Try depressing that once or twice and see if the problem goes away. Sometimes keys can become jammed down and send a continuous signal; this has happened to me a few times with my Alt key to much distress. If hitting the key doesn\'t work go to Keyboard in your control panel and try to resolve the problem from there.
Works when I hold it down, but I can\'t get it to stay?
You\'ve somehow enabled the function keys (or just the numpad) to be set as default - reverse this by going into the control panel as I mentioned. There should be an option in there for it somewhere.
\'parently I had num-lock on, making the FN keys default if I pressed FN.
